string.value: You're now a Warrior! But you have no idea what to do... Get help from #b#p1022000##k.
#p1022000# suggests that you hunt monster as basic training. He wants you to beat up #r20 #o0130100#s#k. #o0130100#s live near #m102000000# so he said they're easy to find.\n\n#o0130100# #r#a21281##k
You defeated 20 #o0130100#s and reported the news to #p1022000#. Too easy!

어린 전사 형제여. 전사가 되었다고 자네의 강함이 완성된 것은 아니라네. 아직 자네는 스스로의 힘으로 전투에 임하기에 부족하군... 자네에겐 이 주먹펴고 일어서의 수련이 필요할 것 같은데... 어떤가? 수련을 해보겠나?
#L0# #b수련을 하겠습니다.#l 

#L1# 스스로의 힘으로 할 수 있습니다. #I
스스로의 한계를 인정하고 더 좋은 길을 찾는 것 역시 전사가 갖춰야 할 바람직한 자세. 좋네. 자네에게 수련을 시켜주겠네.
스스로의 힘으로 수련을 할 수 있다면 그것도 좋겠지. 하지만 그것이 자네의 자만일수도 있음을 잊지 말게. 스스로의 수준을 잘 살펴야 한다네.

Little Warrior brother. Just becoming a warrior doesn't mean that you're completely strong. You still need to be trained.. I think this #p1022000# training is useful. What do you think? Do you want to go for a training session?
#L0# #bYes, I do.#l 

#L1# I can do it by myself. #I
That is the right attitude to have if you want to become a strong warrior. I'll teach you how to train by yourself.
It's good if you can train yourself. But, you shouldn't trust yourself too much. It's better to know your level.

You are far too weak to fight against strong monsters. You had better learn how to hunt by first hunting #o0130100#s. #o0130100#s live around #m102000000#. It won't be hard to hunt them. Please let me know when you have defeated twenty #o0130100#s.
You're not ready yet to be trained.
You got rid of twenty #o0130100#. Good. You can't be satisfied with this. This is the first step to be a Warrior.
When I think you need more training, I'll call you. Until we meet again...keep training hard!
You haven't killed #rtwenty#o0130100##k yet. Try harder if you want to be stronger.
